channel.title: Some trouble
channel.description:
im using an old school devoltuion server, i cant get the compiler working. Ive set the paths for it to go but just cant get it. If anyone has a devolution compiler or one that might fit it could u post?
if this helps this was the code i last left off with
@echo off title Converting To Byte Code... color 0a "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\java"Client pause
still though couldnt get that thing compiling right, must have messed with it for a good half hour

item.title: Some trouble
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

iz3 legend:

theres not an error i just cant get it to compile right, says cannot find path specified even when im almost positive i have specified the path

Post the error.

Read full topic
